In the 2003 movie 'LOC Kargil', which of the following elements stood in for each other during the production and filming?
Options:
A. A. SLRS and G3 rifles used by Pakistan army
B. B. Tanks and Fighter jets
C. C. Soldiers and Civilians
D. D. Helicopters and Drones
Correct Answer: A. SLRS and G3 rifles used by Pakistan army
